ai-patthana15.73:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.73:1.1_0: Neither grasps, doesn’t give rise to diversity of views, and grasped causes.
ai-patthana15.73:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.73:2.1_0: Neither grasps, doesn’t grasp, and commit adultery.
ai-patthana15.73:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
